body_html:
@asimshankar aah, so that's ok for install from pip?
You're right, I've installed from pip, but I haven't found any info, that I can't use bazel or other contrib utils then. Even on contrib docs section. Thanks for claryfying, I'll try to make build from source

body:
@asimshankar aah, so that's ok for install from ```pip```? 
You're right, I've installed from ```pip```, but I haven't found any info, that I can't use ```bazel``` or other ```contrib``` utils then. Even on ```contrib``` docs section. Thanks for claryfying, I'll try to make build from source
